snippet: Despite Brazil’s budget problems, there will be no cuts in a pioneering and widely admired program of monthly cash allowances to the poor.
abstract: Tereza Campello, Brazilian official in charge of program that gives monthly cash allowances to country's poor, says effort will not have any of its funding cut despite Brazil's budgetary and economic problems.
lead_paragraph: Despite Brazil’s budget problems, there will be no cuts in a pioneering and widely admired program of monthly cash allowances to the poor.

headline.main: Brazil to Keep Allowances for the Poor
headline.print_headline: Brazil to Keep Allowances for the Poor
